successes.title: Precision Gyroscope
successes.description: A mysterious object that appears to defy gravity, this precision gyroscope is beautiful to behold and will amaze you and your friends.

Pledges.description: MANUKA FRIEND: Our eternal gratitude, and the opportunity to follow the project with our regular updates

EARLY BIRD: As a gyroscope pioneer you get a MANUKA COLOUR reward for just $45 (~Â£28)! We only ask you spread the Kickstarter love and get word out to friends. Reward includes the coloured gyroscope, kevlar string and pull handle. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA RAW: This is the raw machined aluminium look with no coating. Each surface finish is subtly different and unique. Reward includes the raw gyroscope, kevlar string and pull handle. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA RAW: This is the raw machined aluminium look with no coating. Each surface finish is subtly different and unique. Reward includes the raw gyroscope, kevlar string and pull handle. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA COLOUR: Choose from any of the available colours including a Kickstarter exclusive green. The surface finish is consistent and beautiful. Reward includes a coloured gyroscope in silver, black, gold, red, blue or green, kevlar string and pull handle. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA COLOUR: Choose from any of the available colours including a Kickstarter exclusive green. The surface finish is consistent and beautiful. Reward includes a coloured gyroscope in silver, black, gold, red, blue or green, kevlar string and pull handle. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA SHOWCASE: The Manuka Colour reward but with the high precision aluminium display stand. Reward includes a coloured gyroscope, kevlar string, pull handle and display stand. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15

MANUKA ENGRAVED: The Manuka Showcase reward with stand and personalised engraving. Ideal as a personalised gift for yourself or someone special. Reward includes a coloured gyroscope, kevlar string, pull handle, display stand and personalised engraving. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA SHOWCASE PLUS: The Manuka Colour reward but with the high precision Super-Stand. Reward includes a coloured gyroscope, kevlar string, pull handle and Super-Stand. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15

MANUKA GIFT: The Manuka Engraved reward with stand and personalised engraving but this time guaranteed for Christmas or all your money back! Reward includes a coloured gyroscope, kevlar string, pull handle, display stand and personalised engraving. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $20.

MANUKA ENGRAVED PLUS: The Manuka Showcase Plus reward with Super-Stand and personalised engraving. Ideal as a personalised gift for yourself or someone special. Reward includes a coloured gyroscope, kevlar string, pull handle, Super-Stand and personalised engraving. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $15.

MANUKA COLLECTOR: A strictly limited edition collectors' set of all SEVEN colours, each with stand and engraving of your choice plus a unique engraved edition serial number (eg. limited edition:15/50). Also guaranteed for Christmas. Reward includes the Raw, Silver, Black, Gold, Red, Blue and Kickstarter exclusive Green gyroscopes, kevlar strings, seven pull handles, seven display stands and personalised engraving on all gyros all in a beautiful custom box. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $30. Strictly limited to 50 units!

MANUKA COLLECTOR: A strictly limited edition collectors' set of all SEVEN colours, each with stand and engraving of your choice plus a unique engraved edition serial number (eg. limited edition:15/50). Reward includes the Raw, Silver, Black, Gold, Red, Blue and Kickstarter exclusive Green gyroscopes, kevlar strings, seven pull handles, seven display stands and personalised engraving on all gyros all in a beautiful custom box. Delivery for x-mass is not guaranteed but we will do our best and you will be first in line for shipment. EU AND US SHIPPING IS INCLUDED! For rest of world add $30. Strictly limited to 50 units!

MANUKA GOLD: A hand made solid sterling silver frame with 24ct gold plated brass disk. A true expression of precision craftsmanship, beauty and design. This gyroscope is timeless and for those who are passionate, creative, and aspiring about form and function. It will be hallmarked in London and come in a special presentation case. A stand, pull string, bespoke hand engraving and world wide shipping is included in this unique reward. Only 5 will be produced. Guaranteed in time for Christmas.
